name: Papadam
ingredients: Plate with tissues (to absorb excess oil)
instructions: 2. Add oil to a wok & use high until the oil smokes.
3. Then change the heat to medium.
4. Add 1 papadam (8 pieces) at once & remove from the
oil when the color has slightly changed (few seconds)
cultural_notes_sinhala: ඉවුම් පිහුම් පොතෙන් උපුටා ගන්නා ලදී
